actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

actions.text: Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 99-760.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Laid on Table in House by Unanimous Consent.
House Incorporated this Measure in S.1963 as an Amendment.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain interests in lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to the New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, for a fee, to the New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology, Socorro, New Mexico, specified lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to be used for educational and research purposes. Reserves to the United States all mineral rights in such lands. Prohibits any new patents relating to such lands under the U.S. mining law.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain interests in lands in Socorro County, New Mexico, to the New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology.
